author: wn.com
title: Norwegian “Rewards” UK frequent flyers with Premium discount (Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA)
text: ( Source : Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA ) Passengers encouraged to join free scheme as number of UK members continues to grow Norwegian, the third largest low-cost carrier in Europe , is offering members of its loyalty programme, Norwegian Reward,
